website_summaries.verdict: This premium all metal wheel boasts a seamless design that goes the extra mile when it comes to safety.
pros: Pressed steel construction is free of sharp edges, seams, and joints
All metal construction is durable and doesn't absorb odors
Wide track with a solid surface is safe and comfortable to run on
Open side helps with temperature regulation
cons: Can cause a racket when mounted on rickety cage walls

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Wheel with a bit of tweaking!
customer_reviews.text: Best wheel ever! It’s heavy though and my cage needed some reinforcement to keep it from rattling (the cage, not the wheel) but my chinchilla figured it out in less than 2 minutes after initial installation! It did begin to wobble a little but I just tightened the screw in the middle and it’s been perfect ever since. This wheel is silent, but your cage may not be. If it rattles the cage, reinforce with metal rods to make the cage itself more sturdy. This will also help with how heavy the wheel is. Not for thin barred cages
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing buy for rats!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying that the wheel was well packaged and sent very fast. It spun smoothly and without noise. The mounting bracket is made sturdy and has wingnuts for easy installation. I bought this wheel for my male rats to reduce the chance of a spinal injury and provide them with a outlet for excess energy. The only down side might be the bearings. They work wonderfully but cation is advised when cleaning in order to prevent rust. All in all I am very satisfied with this purchase and plan to buy another for my female rats.
customer_reviews.author: roy hasaface

customer_reviews.title: My 2 Chinchillas 100 MPH
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these wheels because I have 2 chinchillas they replaced their plastic wheels I love these they are way bigger and my chin's are getting big so this was the perfect size for them and since these are metal I don't have to worry about them chilling away at the plastic and wearing it down these will last for ever I hope anyway they love them they had been running on them at 100 MPH.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy A. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This wheel is huge! I bought this for my rats and they Looove it!!!!! It is supper quiet. I didn’t even have to add any kind of extra reinforcement to the cage to hold it on. It is very heavy but as long as you position it right and tighten it using a pair of pliers it’s very sturdy! Definitely recommend this wheel!
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower Moonlight Rattery

customer_reviews.title: A little off center but the chins love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy wheel that our chins absolutely LOVE! It required some extra attention to attach it to the cage without rattling, though, and still shows a wobble when it spins. But, our chins love it and we wanted an all metal wheel that wouldn't stain like the ones with wood. Sorry to see that all wheels of this size are so expensive though.
customer_reviews.author: H. Pryer

customer_reviews.title: not as described - seller shady
customer_reviews.text: not at all as described severel issues remain unresolved -shady safety issues - returns are a nightmare - Prime
customer_reviews.author: ms

customer_reviews.title: Toughest wheel
customer_reviews.text: At first the Chinchilla did not use it. After a few days the guy jumps in and runs like crazy. A little louder than the other wheels, but has lasted longer and given enough room to avoid back issues for him.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Starkey

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT !!
customer_reviews.text: My chin LOVES this wheel. It is a little noisy and rattles the cage a bit when she runs but nothing too crazy. It’s definitely helped her to get out some of her energy and she uses it every day!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Snowy loves loves his exercise wheel
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My daughter's Chinchilla loves it. The only thing is that it wasn't as quiet running as we thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered three of these for my various chinchilla habitats as an upgrade from the Kaytee plastic and they absolutely love it! It was so cute the first night seeing the one go non stop and proceed to plop and go straight to sleep he was so tuckered out!
customer_reviews.author: Sam F

customer_reviews.title: Not worthy of the cost
customer_reviews.text: This product is not worth the money I paid. The $30 wheels at a pet store last longer than this product. I used it with 2 bonded chins. It was sooo noisy, bearing fell apart within days. We moved it to a single chin cage. It was much quieter but continues to fall apart. I am soo disappointed in this wheel. $120 up in smoke.
customer_reviews.author: cindy w.

customer_reviews.title: Chinchilla loves it
customer_reviews.text: Our chinchilla loves running on this wheel all night long.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This wheel is the perfect size for a chinchilla. It is super heavy and sturdy. It is so quiet when it is being used. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: mcquillan

customer_reviews.title: no noise
customer_reviews.text: Strong, silent,wasy to keep clean, and shipped on time and well packed
customer_reviews.author: indexer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time and money.
customer_reviews.text: Got it and it was so quiet!!!!! Less than 2 weeks later and it is so noisy!!!! Don't waste your money if you have a chinchilla!!! The bearing keeps coming loose and it rattles the whole cage!! It is a pain to take out and tighten it. Just NOT worth the 100 bucks!!!
customer_reviews.author: sarah e. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this product! Completely worth every penny! My chin has been so happy since we put it in his cage!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline O.

customer_reviews.title: What I needed
customer_reviews.text: Came in perfect condition and my chin loves it. The wheel is silent but when attached to the cage it can be very noisy.
customer_reviews.author: M.E.TRAN

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. I don't expect to ever have to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Wheel for chinchilla
customer_reviews.text: Was bought as an upgrade wheel for our pet Chinchilla.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Tovar

customer_reviews.title: huge wheel
customer_reviews.text: larger than I expected well made it would be great if my pleasantly plump Chinchilla would use it.....
customer_reviews.author: Leeza

customer_reviews.title: Not quiet at all
customer_reviews.text: This wheel wobbles and is not quiet at all. Definitely not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely WONDERFUL Wheel
customer_reviews.text: I have a pet rat that absolutely runs in the wheel so much that her tail was curving. I realized the wheel she was using was also not good for her back. This wheel is great and easy for her to use and sooooo very quiet. I wanted to put it on my holiday list but it is now unavailable. Hope they get more.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D. Jarman Karr

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy - gets noisy if not oiled
customer_reviews.text: This wheel is very sturdy, easy to clean and quick to put up. But, it does get noisy if not oiled. The noise is very loud so make sure to oil your regularly. Other than that my chinchillas love this wheel and use it daily. The wheel itself is massive, so it gives the animal lots of space to run
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Ponomarenko

customer_reviews.title: The very best wheel on the market
customer_reviews.text: If you have a chinchilla this is an absolute must. I have owned every wheel in this is absolutely the best
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: SILENT
customer_reviews.text: Don't order a chin spin this is where its at, no wait, no worry if you package will ever arrive. Arrived earlier than I expected and if you mouth it properly with the diagram not noise at all and the boys love it.
customer_reviews.author: Annoyed

customer_reviews.title: product not working properly
customer_reviews.text: wheel will not turn and I cannot tighten it or take apart to put in new bearings .
customer_reviews.author: pamela

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful floor space saving vertical wheel
customer_reviews.text: Finally, competition for another vertical chin wheel. So far, this wheel has performed wonderfully. It is quiet and my chins can really get it going. This wheel is all metal and sturdy and well made. I wish they had provided more washers though, so there can be one on each side of the cage wire. It works without 2 on each bolt, just think it would be better to use 2. Works for all of my chins except for my big, wide show quality chins. They like the Exotic Nutrition treadmill wheel better.
customer_reviews.author: Diane K.

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY LOUD!!!
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE! This wheel is nice, beautiful, and big but EXTREMELY LOUD!!! It sounds like pots and pans banging together at night. Sent it back to the company and when it came back it was just as loud. If you don't mind noise, this is a great wheel, but I bought it for the silent aspect and it fails at that feature sadly. For reference, I use this for 1 chinchilla and it is installed on a Critter Nation cage.
customer_reviews.author: C.Yi

customer_reviews.title: Get yourself a chin spin
customer_reviews.text: The bearings click as it moves. The chin likes it but is EXTREMELY wobbly and loud
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Total Rip Off
customer_reviews.text: This product is a total rip off. Nobody should ever pay this much for a metal running wheel. The metal is cheap and the production for a product like this would also be very cheap. There is no reason this product should be over $35. The sellers are either doing a terrible job at manufacturing an affordable product or they are totally trying to rip customers off. DO NOT BUY THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Exotic Nutrition 15" Chin-Sprint : All-Metal Durable, Fast Exercise Wheel - for Chinchillas, Prairie Dogs, Rats, Degus, Hedgehogs, Opossums & Other Small Pets
product_meta.description:
The Chin-Sprint is the first and only exercise wheel on the market of its kind!

APPROXIMATE SIZE: 15" diameter x 8" wide (6" wide track)

FEATURES:
✔ DURABLE - all-metal construction, mountable, and featuring an open-faced design with extra-wide running track.
✔ SAFE - A single unit of heavy-gauge steel is pressed into shape, no seams or joints to cause injury.
✔ HEALTHY - Huge 15” diameter prevents curvature of the spin, while axle-free construction eliminates risk of tail entanglement.
✔ ADAPTABLE - Mounts to all wire cages, finished with a pet-safe powder coat.
✔ LONG-LASTING - This heavy-duty wheel is indestructible, pet owners will never buy another wheel again.
✔ VERSATILE - Ideal for Chinchillas, Prairie Dogs, Rats, Degus, Squirrels, and other small mammals.
feature_bullets: ✔ 100% ALL METAL - Ultra heavy-duty, quickly wipes clean, no wood/plastic to absorb odor, crack, splinter, or be chewed on. You will never have to buy another wheel again! Great for Chinchillas, Prairie Dogs, Rats, Degus, Squirrels, and other small mammals.
✔ EXTRA WIDE TRACK - Running surface is 6 inches across. Wheel easily mounts to side of any wired cage. Finished with a pet-safe powder coat for durability.

✔ SAFE - Huge 15 inch diameter prevents curvature of the spin, while axle-free construction eliminates risk of tail entanglement. All edges have been hemmed smooth for safety, and powder coating provides extra layer of coverage to edges.
✔ SMOOTH SPIN - Dual ball bearings allow the wheel to spin super smooth and fast! Dual ball bearings roll within the wheel, eliminating the friction normally caused by a rotating/sliding axle.

✔ FAST, FREE SHIPPING in USA! Avg 3 days! ZooPro sells exotic animal food and accessories that are manufactured by Exotic Nutrition Pet Supply Company. Exotic Nutrition has been the industry leader of exotic animal products since 1998, specializing in sugar gliders, hedgehogs, prairie dogs, marmosets, degus, skunks, opossums, chinchillas, rats, hamsters, gerbils, squirrels, rabbits, guinea pigs, rodents, ferrets, chickens, bluebirds, wild birds, monkeys, marsupials, reptiles, amphibians & more
